alert.note: Alert for Bristol Bay; Kuskokwim Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Watch issued October 07 at 1:48PM AKDT until October 11 at 10:00AM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... The National Weather Service in Anchorage has issued a Coastal Flood Watch, which is in effect from late Sunday night through Tuesday morning. * LOCATION...Kuskokwim Delta and Bristol Bay coasts. * COASTAL FLOODING...Water level rises from 2 to 6 feet above normal highest tide line are possible. * TIMING...Water levels will rise with high tide Monday and possibly again Tuesday before subsiding. * IMPACTS...Potential for coastal erosion due to higher seas and surf with southwesterly to westerly winds. Low lying areas may also experience flooding.
info.instruction: A coastal flood watch means that conditions favorable for flooding are expected to develop. Coastal residents should be alert for later statements or warnings, and take action to protect property.
